img_above_text:
Take the main path first to find a few enemies up ahead, and an open shack on the right where the dim glow of another green Wisp can be seen. Be wary, as there's another Puppet Spider hiding in the shadows waiting for you to try and absorb the spirit!
Approach the enemy holding the lanterns cautiously, as the other side of the shack you investigated hides an archer who will try to ambush you once you engage the other foe.
img_below_text:
This Dragonfly Guai will fire off poison arrows at a measured pace, which are an unfortunate pairing with the fiery hostile wisps the Lantern Holder can create, alongside his equally poisonous sickle.
![Wukong Lanxi 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/83/Wukong_Lanxi_8.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 7 from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "Take the main path first to find a few enemies up ahead, and an open shack on the right where the dim glow of another green Wisp can be seen. Be wary, as there's another Puppet Spider hiding in the shadows waiting for you to try and absorb the spirit!
Approach the enemy holding the lanterns cautiously, as the other side of the shack you investigated hides an archer who will try to ambush you once you engage the other foe."
            - Following Text: "This Dragonfly Guai will fire off poison arrows at a measured pace, which are an unfortunate pairing with the fiery hostile wisps the Lantern Holder can create, alongside his equally poisonous sickle.
![Wukong Lanxi 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/83/Wukong_Lanxi_8.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a nighttime scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a tense encounter between the player character and a formidable enemy in front of a traditional shack. The enemy, a Lantern Holder, is seen wielding a sickle and is accompanied by another foe, an archer, who is positioned to ambush the player from the shadows. The image highlights the strategic combat elements and the dark, atmospheric setting of the game.
